content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Farhad Abbasi from Iran. He is a potential tenant interested in renting my apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of our conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for the apartment. We started with a proposal of 700 Euro per month and ended up agreeing on a price of 725 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price we agreed upon was 725 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate Farhad Abbasi's likeability as an 8. He was respectful, reasonable, and showed a willingness to compromise, which are all qualities I appreciate in a negotiation partner.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.]
name: Peter Schmidt
